title: Plaid Cymru
summary: Plaid Cymru (English: /ˌplaɪd ˈkʌmri/ PLYDE KUM-ree;[22] Welsh: [plaid ˈkəmri]; officially Plaid Cymru – the Party of Wales, often referred to simply as Plaid) is a centre-left to left-wing, Welsh nationalist political party in Wales, committed to Welsh independence from the United Kingdom.[23][24]
